Repeat: sl 1 wyib, k5; turn, sl 1 wyif, p4; turn sl 1 wyib, k4; turn, sl 1 wyif, p4; then slip the next (ColorA) stitch wyif, slip the following stitch wyib; bring yarn through to front, then slip the last 2 stitches back again to left-hand needle; turn, sl 1 wyib, k4

sl 1 wyib, k5; turn, sl 1 wyif, p4; turn sl 1 wyib, k4; turn, sl 1 wyif, p4; then slip the next (ColorA) stitch wyif, slip the following stitch wyib; bring yarn through to front, then slip the last 2 stitches back again to left-hand needle; turn, sl 1 wyib, k4
